zh_how: 逐渐将可视化元素的形状从一个更改为另一个
en_how: Gradually change the shape of visualization elements from one to another
zh_why: 新旧数据事实的可视化元素之间的无缝转换。强调两个数据事实之间的对应关系
en_why: Seamless transition between visualization elements of old and new data facts. Emphasis the corresponding relationship between two data facts.

zh_how: 旧场景淡出，新场景进入并重叠在旧场景之上
en_how: After the old scene faded out halfway and stopped, the new scene fades in and overlaps on top of the old scene
zh_why: 减轻查找两个数据事实之间的差异或对应关系的难度
en_why: Ease the difficulty for finding the difference or the correspondence between two data facts

zh_how: 在转场过程中保持视觉相似性（例如颜色、形状、位置）
en_how: Maintaining visual similarities (e.g., color, shape, position) during the transition
zh_why: 通过建立视觉连接来数据的跳跃性
en_why: Smooth over the inherent discontinuity by building visual connections

zh_how: 旧数据事实的一个或多个元素移动（例如，飞行、下降）到新数据事实并停留/淡出/更改为新数据事实中的可视化元素
en_how: One or more elements of the old data fact move (e.g., fly, drop) to the new data fact and stay/fade out/change into visualization elements in the new data fact
zh_why: 通过元素的移动转移观众的注意力
en_why: Shift viewers' attention via the movement of objects

zh_how: 沿一个方向移动相机。在相机移动期间，旧数据事实消失，新数据事实出现
en_how: Moving the camera along one direction. During the camera movement, the old data fact diappears and the new data fact occurs.
zh_why: 用相机的移动来暗示场景的变化
en_why: Use camera movement to suggest scene changes

zh_how: 相机靠近并聚焦在旧数据事实的一个元素上 (聚焦元素可能发生变化以呈现新的数据事实)
en_how: The camera moves close to and focuses on an element in the old data fact (the focused element may changes to present the new data fact)
zh_why: 将观众的注意力吸引到重要的元素上
en_why: Bring audience's attention to the elements of interest

zh_how: 相机移动直到原始场景中的元素难以观察（例如，移动太近而无法看到），然后切换到新的数据事实
en_how: The camera moves until elements in the original scene are hard to observe (e.g., Move too close to see), then change to the new data fact.
zh_why: 将观众的注意力吸引到重要的元素上
en_why: Bring audience's attention to the elements of interest

zh_how: 相机向后移动以显示更大的场景；新数据事实的元素出现在更大的场景中
en_how: The camera moves backward to show a larger scene; elements of the new data fact appear within the larger scene
zh_why: 摆脱先前数据事实的狭隘视角，提升至更高的视角
en_why: Gets rid of the narrow perspective of the prior data fact and raises to a higher view

en_how: Moving the camera along one direction. During the camera movement, the old data fact diappears and the new data fact occurs.

en_why: Use camera movement to suggest scene changes
